The line is automatically drawn.\n    ctx.beginPath();\n    ctx.moveTo(pointX0,pointY0);\n    ctx.arcTo(pointX1, pointY1, pointX2, pointY2, radius);\n    ctx.stroke();\n\n}); // end window.onload\n</script>\n</head>\n<body>\n    <canvas id=\"canvas\" width=200 height=150></canvas>\n</body>\n</html>"
